quotedTweet.content: Librarians—a thought from Rocky Top. The library went online decades ago. No profession is better poised than ours to serve our communities while safeguarding ourselves and our users. As a veteran I am reminded of the infantry motto—“follow me!” So I say, let’s lead. Follow us!
quotedTweet.renderedContent: Librarians—a thought from Rocky Top. The library went online decades ago. No profession is better poised than ours to serve our communities while safeguarding ourselves and our users. As a veteran I am reminded of the infantry motto—“follow me!” So I say, let’s lead. content: 2 weeks from tonight is Torch Night. “One that beareth a torch shadoweth oneself to give light to others.” This is the creed Volunteers live by. Since 1925, Torch Night has been a rite of passage for the incoming class of Volunteers. Can’t wait to experience this great tradition.
